# Document with Multiple Sections

## Section 1: Users

| ID | Name | Role |
|----|------|------|
| 1 | Alice | Admin |
| 2 | Bob | User |

## Section 2: Products

| SKU | Name | Price |
|-----|------|-------|
| A001 | Widget | $10 |
| A002 | Gadget | $20 |

## Section 3: Orders

| Order ID | User | Total |
|----------|------|-------|
| 1001 | Alice | $30 |
| 1002 | Bob | $50 |

## Section 4: Summary

| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Total Users | 2 |
| Total Products | 2 |
| Total Orders | 2 |
